path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - House of Kibaa NFT Sale Smartcontracts - v1.2.pdf

findings.title: User can buy NFT with price lower than the BOTTOM_PRICE value
findings.description: In PrivatePublicSale.sol contract, users are able to purchase NFTs at a price lower than the defined BOTTOM_PRICE value.

findings.title: Insufficient Whitelist Balance in mintPrivateSale Function
findings.description: The require statement in the mintPrivateSale function checks if the user's whitelist balance is sufficient for purchase, but it may raise an error and revert even when the user has enough balance.

findings.title: Inconsistent Comments with State Variables
findings.description: Some state variables in the contract aren't corresponding to the comments.

findings.title: Redundant function in the contract
findings.description: There is a redundant function in the LandNFT.sol contract.

findings.title: Redundant code in withdraw function
findings.description: The withdraw function of PrivatePublicSale.sol contains redundant code.

findings.title: Redundant state variables in the contract
findings.description: There are some state variables that are unused in the contract but the name of them may cause users confuse.

findings.title: Using calldata instead of memory for gas saving
findings.description: The contract may change to use calldata for memory in certain functions for gas saving.
function: whitelistMembers(address[] memory users, uint8[] memory balance…)
